hero.title: Graphic designer born in Logro√±o
hero.description: Passionate about branding and editorial design. With a master's degree in Art Direction and Artificial Intelligence applied to Design.

infoText.part4: . I combine creativity and technology to develop visual identities that connect with people and empower brands. When I'm not designing, I explore new creative applications of AI. I'm passionate about bringing together art, design and technology to drive the future of visual communication. If you want to know more, download my CV:

experience1.description: In my role as a designer in the marketing department, I am responsible for bringing the company's communication to life across all channels. I design and edit podcasts and videos, prepare sales materials and develop the necessary resources for worldwide events. Additionally, I create content for social networks and acquisition campaigns, ensuring that each piece reflects the company's identity and values.

experience2.description: During my internship, I transformed the marketing team's requirements into visual content for different social networks. Some of the posts I designed managed to reach up to one million interactions, effectively connecting with the audience and strengthening the brand's digital presence.

experience3.description: I designed intuitive digital experiences, from wireframes and prototypes to final interfaces, ensuring usability and consistency with brand identity. I collaborated with developers to implement user-centered solutions.

contact.title: Got an idea for your project
contact.description: Want to start a new project or just say hello? Send me an email and I'll do my best to respond within 24 hours!
